hero.subtitle: Climbing Essentials
hero.title: Gear That
hero.description: Every purchase funds new climbing route development. Premium climbing chalk and gear that supports the community.

chalk.name: Pure Magnesium Carbonate
chalk.description: Premium pure magnesium carbonate for superior grip and performance.
features: Suitable for dry or wet skin

chalkBall.name: Chalk Ball
chalkBall.description: Convenient chalk ball for mess-free application during climbs.
features: Perfect for gym and rock climbing

liquidChalk.name: Liquid Chalk
liquidChalk.description: Advanced liquid chalk formula that dries quickly for lasting grip.

tshirt.name: CliffRise Logo T-Shirt
tshirt.description: Comfortable organic cotton t-shirt with CliffRise logo.

hat.name: CliffRise Climbing Hat
hat.description: Adjustable climbing hat with embroidered CliffRise logo.

products.title: Premium Climbing Essentials
products.description: Every product sold contributes directly to new climbing route development. Choose quality gear that gives back to the climbing community.

mission.title: Our mission: more routes, a stronger community
mission.description1: CliffRise was created with one simple idea - to make climbing more accessible by funding the development of new routes. Every product you buy from us directly helps open new lines and create new opportunities for climbers of all levels.
mission.description2: We believe that good gear should be more than something you use - it should give something back. That’s why our entire model is built around supporting the climbing community. With every purchase, you’re not just getting a product, you’re helping grow the sport and create something that lasts.
mission.communityFirstDesc: Every purchase funds new climbing routes

footer.description: Premium climbing gear that funds route development worldwide. Every purchase creates new climbing opportunities.

impact.title: Real Impact, Real Routes
impact.description: See how the CliffRise community is making a difference in climbing areas. Every purchase leads to tangible results and leaves a lasting impact on the climbing community.
impact.routesFundedDesc: New climbing routes developed through community purchases
impact.contributedDesc: Total funds directed to route development projects
impact.climbersImpactedDesc: Community members who have accessed new routes
impact.projectDescription: Our most recent funding helped establish 20 new routes at Teteven, Zaslona. These routes provide intermediate climbers with routes in the range 5c-8a and have become some of the most popular climbs in the area.

notification.routeFunding: This purchase helps fund new climbing routes!

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.emptyDesc: Add some products to get started
cart.routeFunding: 100% of profits go to route development
